channel.title: 🏢 Chinese University of Hong Kong on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Chinese University of Hong Kong on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Imagine360: Immersive 360 Video Generation from Perspective Anchor
item.description: Imagine360: Generating immersive 360° videos from perspective videos, improving quality and accessibility of 360° content creation.

item.title: Video-3D LLM: Learning Position-Aware Video Representation for 3D Scene Understanding
item.description: Video-3D LLM masters 3D scene understanding by cleverly fusing video data with 3D positional encoding, achieving state-of-the-art performance.
